entry.title: Slow and Steady
entry.summary: Ideas about the life after reaching 30 years!
entry.content:
It is time to stop, and reflect. I arrived possibly to the half of the way, so, it is a good moment to look back and see the many things that I have done wrong, and the few things that I have done well.

This is merely a personal reflection, I am making public, because, yep, the people put its stuff in internet. Hopefully, will be useful for my niece in some years, so, I dedicate these words to you Karol, some years in the future.

I am trying to put together the noise from last years, piece things together, or as someone said, connect the points.

Mexico, the roots

I dream, since the most inner of my hearth that Mexico will change, that a new and different Mexico is possible. It is worth to dream about it. But recently, I started to think, that maybe not, maybe Mexico will never change.

I did believe in the political project of the left, at this point, after some time they (we) arrived to the power.

The PhD and Data Science

For first time in my life I am not sure about the doctorate.

It is depressive to tell it, but I am not more in love with science as I was at the beggining.

I was not enjoying the path in too many stages; I became to Germany, waiting to learn

%This has caused me to doubt every single decision I’ve made over the past few years

%Un día eres joven y al día siguiente estás reflexionando sobre la vida.

% to say the least

% Thinking outside of the box

No te revientes reata, por que (no) es el último tirón.

My health

% Put here the image of thirty zone

It is when you start to care about your health, about the future, about the happiness.

Loneliness and love

During a lot of time, loneliness was not a problem, I truly enjoyed to be alone in the highschool, I read a lot during that period.

I have been alone most of time during these thirty years, at the middle of my twenties, this became a horrible thing.

Happily, I still have few friends that helped me in hard moments, so, I am not totally alone.

Being the good and turning the other cheek does not work, at least not for me, at least not in every case. Why is so hard to find real friends?

I am feeling empty. For me is too complicate (it is impossible) to forgive.

I have been in love with Irasu and Miriam during the highschool, and Valeria during the highschool.

The thing with Irasu never worked, she hit me. With Miriam and Valeria was different, I was not able to give the last step. Yes, I am a mother fucker.

I don't give a shit to write the name of the girls, very likely they won't read this.

And then, happened again, I fall in love during last year. I even learned to ride a bike because of that, and that is interesting, because I never tried to ride a bike after I fell down so badly when I was a kid. Once again, as with Irasu, I was hitted. Even worse, I was swinged. As one song in Spanish says: Ácabame de matar, pa' qué me dejas herido.
